definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: For schistosomiasis: xiong huang with nan gua zi (pumpkin seeds), bin nang.
sentences.chinese: 血吸虫病，可与南瓜子，槟榔等同用。

sentences.english: Schistosomes also possess what seems to be a cloak of invisibility: an unusual covering known as the tegument .
sentences.chinese: 血吸虫还有一种如同隐形披风的特殊外衣，称为体壁。

sentences.english: Praziquantel is the only available treatment against all forms of schistosomiasis.
sentences.chinese: 吡喹酮是唯一可用于治疗各种类型血吸虫病的药物。

sentences.english: Objective To construct a multivalent DNA vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 目的构建日本血吸虫多价DNA疫苗。

sentences.english: The cloning and expression of the gene encoding S japonicum tropomyosin had been successfully made.
sentences.chinese: 日本血吸虫原肌球蛋白编码基因克隆和原核表达成功。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the risk factors of cerebral schistosomiasis japonica .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑型血吸虫病发病的危险因素。
中国血吸虫病防治杂志。

sentences.english: The economic and health effects of schistosomiasis are considerable.
sentences.chinese: 血吸虫病造成相当严重的经济和健康影响。

sentences.english: During the first half of the 20th century, schistosomiasis was widespread in the Yangtze River Valley.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪上半期，血吸虫病泛滥于长江流域。

sentences.english: It is concluded that schistosomiasis status is stable in Zhejiang province, however, the prevalence factor for re-emerging of schistosomiasis is still in existence.
sentences.chinese: 结论浙江省血吸虫病疫情稳定，但流行条件仍然存在。

sentences.english: Until now, the main drug used to treat bilharzia has been praziquantel.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，吡喹酮是治疗血吸虫病的主要药物。

sentences.english: Rates of bilharzia, the second most economically devastating disease after malaria, are increasing in China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，血吸虫病的个案正逐步递增。

sentences.english: Oncomelania diffusion is the major way of spreading schistosomiasis.
sentences.chinese: 钉螺扩散是血吸虫病传播的最主要途径。

sentences.english: Objective To survey the epidemic change of schistosomiasis by emigration from xinjizhou.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察新洲居民迁移对血吸虫病流行的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the way of fast control of schistosome infectivity in susceptible zones.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨快速控制血吸虫病易感地带感染性的方法。

sentences.english: Schistosoma japonicum has been spreading across China in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 日本血吸虫近年来在中国重新流行。

definition: trematoda/fluke/trematode worm, approx 6000 species, mostly parasite, incl. on humans
ascariasis/infectation by parasitic roundworm Ascaris lumbricoides
